title: Twitter, Morgan Stanley, Etsy: Stocks That Defined the Week
sub_head: Here are seven major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news
body:
Twitter Inc.
The richest man in the world wants Twitter. It’s not clear whether he will get it. Elon Musk on Thursday made a $43 billion bid for the social-media company, but Twitter adopted a so-called poison pill to prevent a takeover. The offer from Tesla ’s CEO came after he reversed a decision to join Twitter’s board. Twitter shares fell 1.7% Thursday.
